searchSql.baseSql: select sab.case_code,pi.property_addr,tab.guohu_time,sab.sum_base_amount,tab.paid_time from (select case_code,sum(base_amount) sum_base_amount from sctrans.t_ts_award_base where PARTICIPANT in ( select uo.user_id from sctrans.v_user_team ut left join sctrans.v_user_org_job uo on ut.team_id = uo.org_id where ut.user_id = #userId# <if test="caseOrgId != null and caseOrgId != '' "> and ut.team_id = #caseOrgId# </if> <if test="caseUserId != null and caseUserId != '' "> and uo.user_id = #caseUserId# </if> ) group by case_code) sab inner join ( select * from ( select *, ROW_NUMBER() over(partition by case_code order by guohu_time desc) num from sctrans.t_ts_award_base where PARTICIPANT in ( select uo.user_id from sctrans.v_user_team ut left join sctrans.v_user_org_job uo on ut.team_id = uo.org_id where ut.user_id = #userId# <if test="caseOrgId != null and caseOrgId != '' "> and ut.team_id = #caseOrgId# </if> <if test="caseUserId != null and caseUserId != '' "> and uo.user_id = #caseUserId# </if> ) ) t where t.num = 1 ) tab on sab.case_code = tab.case_code left join sctrans.t_to_property_info pi on tab.case_code = pi.case_code where 1 = 1 <if test="caseCode != null and caseCode != '' "> and sab.case_code = #caseCode# </if> <if test="propertyAddr != null and propertyAddr != '' "> and pi.property_addr like '%' + #propertyAddr# + '%' </if> <if test="paidTime != null and paidTime != '' " > and DATEDIFF(mm,tab.paid_time,#paidTime#) = 0 </if> <if test="dtBegin != null and dtBegin != '' " > and tab.guohu_time >= #dtBegin# </if> <if test="dtEnd != null and dtEnd != '' " > and tab.guohu_time <= #dtEnd# </if> order by guohu_time desc

select ab.SRV_CODE, ab.BASE_AMOUNT, ab.SRV_PART_IN, ab.SRV_PART_TOTAL, sc.SATISFACTION, pd.AWARD_KPI_MONEY, pm.FIN_ORDER, pm.FIN_ORDER_ROLL from sctrans.t_ts_award_base ab left join sctrans.T_TS_KPI_SRV_CASE sc on ab.SRV_CODE = sc.SRV_CODE and ab.case_code =sc.case_code left join sctrans.T_TS_AWARD_KPI_PAY_DETAIL pd on ab.SRV_CODE = pd.SRV_CODE and ab.case_code =pd.case_code left join sctrans.T_TS_KPI_PSN_MONTH pm on CONVERT(varchar(7),ab.paid_time,112) = CONVERT(varchar(7),pm.BELONG_MONTH,112) and ab.PARTICIPANT = pm.PARTICIPANT where ab.case_Code = #caseCode#

select ab.SRV_CODE, ab.BASE_AMOUNT, cast(ab.SRV_PART_IN as varchar) SRV_PART_IN, cast(ab.SRV_PART_TOTAL as varchar) SRV_PART_TOTAL, sc.SATISFACTION, pd.AWARD_KPI_MONEY, pm.FIN_ORDER, pm.FIN_ORDER_ROLL,
ab.case_code,pi.property_addr,ab.guohu_time,ab.paid_time from sctrans.t_ts_award_base ab left join sctrans.T_TS_KPI_SRV_CASE sc on ab.SRV_CODE = sc.SRV_CODE and ab.case_code =sc.case_code left join sctrans.T_TS_AWARD_KPI_PAY_DETAIL pd on ab.SRV_CODE = pd.SRV_CODE and ab.case_code =pd.case_code left join sctrans.T_TS_KPI_PSN_MONTH pm on CONVERT(varchar(7),ab.paid_time,112) = CONVERT(varchar(7),pm.BELONG_MONTH,112) and ab.PARTICIPANT = pm.PARTICIPANT left join sctrans.t_to_property_info pi on ab.case_code = pi.case_code where ab.PARTICIPANT in ( select uo.user_id from sctrans.v_user_team ut left join sctrans.v_user_org_job uo on ut.team_id = uo.org_id where ut.user_id = #userId# <if test="caseOrgId != null and caseOrgId != '' "> and ut.team_id = #caseOrgId# </if> <if test="caseUserId != null and caseUserId != '' "> and uo.user_id = #caseUserId# </if> ) <if test="caseCode != null and caseCode != '' "> and sab.case_code = #caseCode# </if> <if test="propertyAddr != null and propertyAddr != '' "> and pi.property_addr like '%' + #propertyAddr# + '%' </if> <if test="paidTime != null and paidTime != '' " > and DATEDIFF(mm,ab.paid_time,#paidTime#) = 0 </if> <if test="dtBegin != null and dtBegin != '' " > and tab.guohu_time >= #dtBegin# </if> <if test="dtEnd != null and dtEnd != '' " > and tab.guohu_time <= #dtEnd# </if> order by guohu_time desc
